title: Burns holds steady, stays 1 shot up at U.S. Open
description: Sam Burns is one round away from a U.S. Open title with no margin for error after Saturday's round of 69 left him with a one-shot lead.

title: Clark's 32 help Fever hand Liberty first loss
description: Caitlin Clark scored a season-high 32 points in her return as the Fever handed the Liberty their first loss of the season.
author: Michael Voepel

title: Russell snatches 'mighty' pole from Verstappen
description: Mercedes' George Russell beats Max Verstappen to pole position for the Canadian Grand Prix in Montreal.

title: Burns leads US Open by one heading into final round
description: Sam Burns maintains slender lead but Adam Scott, JJ Spaun and Viktor Hovland are in pursuit after intriguing third day at the US Open.

title: Frank appointed Tottenham head coach
description: Tottenham have appointed Thomas Frank as their new head coach.

title: Burns leads Scott at US Open with Hovland, Hatton in major mix
description: Adam Scott rolled back the years to move within a shot of Sam Burns heading into the final round of the US Open, as Ryder Cup stars Viktor Hovland and Tyrrell Hatton remained in major contention.

title: Mets, Tylor Megill discuss what went wrong in fourth inning against Rays: 'It spiraled on him'
description: Tylor Megill took the mound in the fourth inning with the Mets up 2-1, but some poorly executed pitches and one fielding error allowed the Rays to put up five runs in New York's eventual loss on Saturday.

title: MLB Manager Clearly Blames Players After 7 Straight Losses
description: Sometimes, the pressure can get to MLB skippers.
